long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en_AU,en_GB,e:
# 自序
=================

为网络调试提供帮助

当开发人员想要进行网络调试的时候， 往往会遇到烦恼的跨域问题。
解决的办法有很多，比如服务端设置响应头，或者自建服务端代为发起请求，亦或者使用一些工具。
但是我想，调试工作或许可以更简单一点。
当你使用了这个插件，在本地(localhost/127.0.0.1)发起的请求将默认支持跨域。
同时，在调试面板里你可能注意到多了一个页面xPanel。
你也可以在这里发起网络请求，也不用担心跨域问题。

## 可用的功能：
 - CORS调试
 - DevTools插件 (同时支持 Electron)

long.en:
# Preface
=================

Help with network debugging

When developers want to run network debugging, they often encounter annoying cross-domain problems.
There are many solutions, such as setting the response header on the server, or build a server to initiate the request instead, or using some tools.
But I thought maybe it could be a little bit easier.
When you use this plugin, requests made locally (localhost/127.0.0.1) will support cross-domain by default.
Also, in the DevTools, you may notice an extra tab called xPanel.
You can also make network requests here without worrying about cross-domain issues.

## The features available:
 - CORS Dev.
 - DevTools Plugin (supported in Electron as well)
